# init(_:color:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new ink, specifying its type and color.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ inkType: PKInk.InkType, color: NSColor = NSColor.black)
```

## Parameters

- **inkType**: The type of ink represented by one of the available [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkingTool-swift.struct/InkType-swift.enum] enumerations.
- **color**: The color of the ink, defaults to black.

## Creating an ink object

- **init(_:color:)**: Creates a new ink, specifying its type and color.
- **PKInk.InkType**: A type alias referring to the ink type of an inking tool.
